entry.title: MRM logo - car stickersHearts
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: Home Decor
Price: 4.95

Add a touch of personality to your vehicle with our vibrant car magnets. Perfect for expressing your style or beliefs, these magnets instantly elevate your car’s appearance, making it a unique reflection of you. They are ideal for anyone who enjoys customization and self-expression, whether it’s for sports teams, favorite quotes, or fun designs. These magnets are versatile and work beautifully on any metal surface, making them a great gift for car enthusiasts or a congratulatory gesture for new drivers. Celebrate any occasion, from birthdays to graduations, with a fun accessory that brings a smile every time you see it!

Product features
- 100% Vinyl: Made from high-quality, versatile PVC for lasting appeal.
- Durability: Designed to withstand all weather conditions without fading or peeling.
- Materials: Crafted from white vinyl with a strong black magnetic backing for easy application.
- Available in 3 Sizes: Choose the perfect size to fit your vehicle's style.
- Matte Finish: Offers a sleek, sophisticated look with minimal glare.

Care instructions
- Wipe the dust off gently with a soft, dry cloth.

entry.title: The Shining Dan Frozen - Custom Pin Buttons
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: Accessories
Price: 4.99

Discover the perfect blend of creativity and nostalgia with these Custom Pin Buttons. Each button radiates a sense of fun and individuality, making them ideal for accessorizing jackets, bags, or hats. Bright, vibrant colors and a glossy finish catch the eye, allowing you to showcase your unique style. Perfect for fans of pop culture, art enthusiasts, or anyone looking to add a quirky touch to their outfit. These buttons make great gifts for birthdays, holidays, and celebrations like Halloween or themed parties. Whether you’re expressing your favorite fandom or making a fashion statement, these buttons are the perfect addition to any collection.

Product features
- Glossy finish for vibrant, eye-catching designs
- Durable steel safety pin backing for secure attachment
- Vivid colors using advanced printing techniques
- Made from high-quality metal with mylar face
- Available in three sizes to suit different preferences

Care instructions
- Wipe the dust or any dirt off gently with a clean, dry cloth.

entry.title: Gorilla - 1 - Sticker
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: Paper products
Price: 19.99

Add your own design of any shape and create uniquely personalised die-cut stickers. These blank stickers are great for both indoor and outdoor use as they are made with thick, resistant, laminate vinyl material. The easy-peel backing makes for great ease of use, while the matte finish helps your designs look sleek on any surface.

.: Material: water-resistant vinyl
.: Suitable for indoor and outdoor use
.: Easy peel backing
.: Matte finish
.: Please note: Small details close to each other will most likely be cut out as one shape

Type: Paper products
Price: 2.57 - 9.99 (4 variants)

A kiss-cut provides you with the ultimate flexibility for implementing your vision—this method cuts the sticker into any shape you desire, while leaving the back intact so that it can be smoothly peeled off the page.

.: Made 100% with durable vinyl that comes with strong 3M glue for decorations that last. Perfect for spicing up indoor decor (not waterproof).
.: Choose between 4 sizes to match your needs. All stickers are 0.004" (1mm) thick and come with a stylish glossy finish.
